titles.title: महिमा, महिमा (Majesty, Majesty) - Mahima Mahima - Rajan

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
तपाईंको अनुग्रहमा रमाउछु,
Your grace has found me just as I am
रित्तो भएपनी तपाईंमा जिउदछु ।
Empty handed, but alive in Your hands

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
तपाईंको प्रेमले परिबर्तितछु
Forever I am changed by Your love
जिबित परमेस्वरको उपस्थितीमा
In the presence of Your Majesty
